ΞL.description: Local meta-synthesis on a Box or sub-Box.

Ξ⊗.description: Tensor-level Xi fusion across δ-Φ-Π-… families.

Ξ⊕.description: Composite Xi synthesis/merging of multiple inputs.

Ξ-\>NF.description: Reduces expressions to Xi-normal form NF\_Ξ.

Ξ\*.description: Adjoint Xi operator; partial decomposition of a Xi-state.
